hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Catalyst via Solana DEX Volume Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: When market is NEUTRAL and Solana 7-day DEX volume increases by >150% week-over-week while SOL price remains within 5% of 20-day high, a transition to BULL regime follows within 3-5 days, with SOL outperforming BTC by >20% in subsequent 2 weeks.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Explosive DEX volume growth on a major chain indicates organic usage surge and capital inflow, often preceding broader market bullish momentum as sentiment shifts from neutral to risk-on. SOL acts as a leading indicator.
entry_conditions: Solana 7-day DEX volume growth > 150% WoW (sources: DefiLlama, Artemis)
Aggregate open interest change for SOL futures < +30% (to exclude pure leverage-driven move)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 25% outperformance vs BTC achieved OR regime shifts to BEAR
exit_conditions.stop_loss: SOL price drops 10% below entry OR DEX volume reverts below 50% WoW growth

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Volume spike is temporary (1-2 day event) or driven by airdrop farming without sustained activity; SOL fails to hold gains despite high volume.
